unnormalised: Arre bhai, Raju 30/02/2025 poiryant aplem bike insurance soglleak cover korta mhunn chintlo, tachea bhaxen ravonaka! Zalear, *kitleakshya* policies Februvarychea xevekuch manya astat, ani ti leap year naslearuch! Rs. 5000 udkant galle.
normalised: Arre bhai, Raju bhaxen zaunakaa zannem chintlem tachea bike insurance-an sogllem cover korta mhunn February thirtieth two thousand and twenty five meren! Punn kaim policies February-chea xevottakuch many asta, ani te legun leap year nastana! Rupee panch hazar udkaant ghelen.
text: Arre bhai, Raju 30/02/2025 poiryant aplem bike insurance soglleak cover korta mhunn chintlo, tachea bhaxen ravonaka! Zalear, *kitleakshya* policies Februvarychea xevekuch manya astat, ani ti leap year naslearuch! Rs. 5000 udkant galle.
